cyclone.name: OLGA
cyclone.current_location: about 320 miles SSW of Lake Charles, Louisiana
cyclone.trajectory: accelerating north-northeast across the north-western Gulf toward the central Louisiana coast, then inland up the Lower Mississippi Valley
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: central-eastern Louisiana coast (near or just west of New Orleans)

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northern and north-central Gulf Coast from coastal Louisiana eastward into Mississippi and Alabama
weather_observation.wind: Only light fringe winds; tropical-storm-force winds are not expected at Brownsville
weather_observation.rainfall: Little to no rainfall directly associated with OLGA expected at Brownsville
weather_observation.other_hazards: Possible increased seas and swells in Gulf shipping lanes well offshore, but minimal impact inside port
